name: Stir-Fried Basil Chicken
ingredients: 1 3/4 pounds boneless chicken breasts, cut into strips, 3 large breasts
6 cups bok choy, chopped, about 16 ounces or one bunch
1/2 cup loosely packed fresh basil leaves, sliced thin, 1/3 ounce container

instructions.en: Mix water, soy sauce, curry paste, and Splenda in a zipper bag; add chicken and marinate 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a wok on high heat.
Stir-fry onions, garlic and red pepper about 30 seconds.
Add chicken and marinade to the wok and stir-fry 4 minutes or until chicken is not quite cooked through.
Add bok choy and cook until crisp-tender, about 4 minutes.
Sprinkle xanthan gum over the surface, mix in well and cook until sauce has thickened.
Stir in basil and heat through.
